pull.title: Add locking annotations for RewindBlockIndex and GetNetworkHashPS. Add missing locks.
pull.body:
While investigating https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15948#issuecomment-489648141 I noticed that calling `RewindBlockIndex` and `GetNetworkHashPS` requires holding `cs_main` (due to accessing `chainActive`) without the functions being annotated as such.

This PR simply makes these implicit locking requirements explicit and adds two missing locks.

The only non-test caller not holding the now annotated locks was `AppInitMain`, but that was not a problem in practice since the `RewindBlockIndex` call happens before any background threads are started.

events.message: Add missing locking annotation for RewindBlockIndex. Add lock in AppInitMain.
Add missing locking annotation for GetNetworkHashPS

rename.from: Add locking annotation for RewindBlockIndex (requires holding cs_main)
rename.to: Add locking annotations for RewindBlockIndex, GetNetworkHashPS and AddTx (ListCoinsTestingSetup)

rename.from: Add locking annotations for RewindBlockIndex, GetNetworkHashPS and AddTx (ListCoinsTestingSetup)
rename.to: Add locking annotations for RewindBlockIndex and GetNetworkHashPS. Add missing locks.

```
cs_main init.cpp:1593 (in thread init) 
```

### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15948](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15948.html) (refactor: rename chainActive by jamesob)
* [#15931](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15931.html) (Remove GetDepthInMainChain dependency on locked chain interface by ariard)
* [#15855](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15855.html) ([refactor] interfaces: Add missing LockAnnotation for cs_main by MarcoFalke)
* [#13582](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/13582.html) (Extract AppInitLoadBlockIndex from AppInitMain by Empact)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
@promag Ouch! Thanks! Looks like we're missing a few `LOCKS_EXCLUDED` annotations... Will rework - closing for now.
